view

Interface IView2ModelAdapter


  • public interface IView2ModelAdapter
    The interface of the adapter from the view to the model that enables the view to talk to the model.
    Author:
    Yiqing Lu, Ye Wang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IView2ModelAdapter NULL_OBJECT
      No-op singleton implementation of IView2ModelAdapter See the web page on the Null Object Design Pattern at http://cnx.org/content/m17227/latest/

        that load a ball from the model
        Parameters:

        paint_fac - the factory that will create the ball's paint strategy
        switchable - if the bal's strategy can be switched
